SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Book
Represents a book in the library.
BookGenerator
Utility class for generating books with associated reviews.
BookJsonRepositoryImpl
JSON implementation of the Book repository.
BookRepository
The repository interface for managing Book entities.
BookRepositoryService
Service class for processing books and interacting with the book repository.
Category
Represents a category of books in the library.
CategoryGenerator
Utility class for generating sets of categories with random names.
CategoryJsonRepositoryImpl
JSON implementation of the Category repository.
CategoryRepository
The repository interface for managing Category entities.
CategoryRepositoryService
Service class for processing categories and interacting with the category repository.
ConsoleUI
ConsoleUI class handles rendering the library application interface in the console.
Entity
Abstract base class for entities in the library management system.
EntityArgumentException
Exception thrown for invalid entity arguments.
EntityNotFoundException
Exception thrown when an entity is not found.
ErrorTemplates
Enumeration of error templates for validation messages.
GenericJsonRepository<E extends Entity>
Generic JSON implementation of the Repository interface.
JsonFileIOException
Exception representing errors related to JSON file operations.
JsonPathFactory
Factory for Path objects for DAO.
JsonRepositoryFactory
Implementation of the UnitOfWork pattern and a factory with singleton.
Library
Represents a library that holds books and manages user activities.
LibraryGenerator
Utility class for generating sets of sample libraries.
LibraryJsonRepositoryImpl
JSON implementation of the Library repository.
LibraryRepository
Repository interface for managing libraries.
LibraryRepositoryService
Service class for processing libraries and interacting with the library repository.
Loan
Represents a loan of a book in the library.
LoanGenerator
Utility class for generating sets of loans.
LoanJsonRepositoryImpl
JSON implementation of the Loan repository.
LoanRepository
Repository interface for managing loans.
LoanRepositoryService
Service class for processing loans and interacting with the loan repository.
Main
The main class responsible for starting the application.
Renderable
The interface representing an object that can be rendered, typically used for rendering user interfaces.
Repository<E extends Entity>
The base interface for repositories that manage entities of type E.
RepositoryFactory
An abstract factory for creating repository instances based on the specified type.
Review
Represents a review for a book in the library.
ReviewGenerator
Utility class for generating sets of reviews.
ReviewJsonRepositoryImpl
JSON implementation of the Review repository.
ReviewRepository
Repository interface for managing reviews.
ReviewRepositoryService
Service class for processing reviews and interacting with the review repository.
User
Represents a user in the library system.
UserGenerator
Utility class for generating sets of users.
UserJsonRepositoryImpl
JSON implementation of the User repository.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing users.
UserRepositoryService
Service class for processing users and interacting with the user repository.
